text: Henryk Kowalski (born 17 July 1933) is a Polish former racing cyclist. He won the Tour de Pologne in 1957 and 1961. He also won the Vuelta a Cuba in 1967. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Henryk Kowalski (cyclist)
